nodes.text: Redok Harvast was a Human male Mandalorian who worked as a bounty hunter on Corellia during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
He wore brown and silver Mandalorian Seeker armor.
Redok Harvast appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a trainer for the bounty hunter class on Corellia.
